member.name: M:AllcardEncryptDecrypt.EncryptDecrypt.TripleDesEncryptText(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a text using TripleDES Encryption.
member.remarks: Encryption Key is "baronpogi" without the quotes.

member.name: M:AllcardEncryptDecrypt.EncryptDecrypt.TripleDesDecryptText(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts a text using TripleDes Decryption.
member.remarks: Decryption Key is "baronpogi" without the quotes.

member.name: M:AllcardEncryptDecrypt.EncryptDecrypt.TripleDesEncrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Procedure for ecrypting text using TripleDes Encryption.

member.name: M:AllcardEncryptDecrypt.EncryptDecrypt.TripleDesDecrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Procedure for decrypting text using TripleDes Dencryption.

member.summary: WRITE ONLY PROPERTY. HAS TO BE SET BEFORE CALLING GENERATE()

member.summary: WRITE ONLY PROPERTY. HAS TO BE SET BEFORE CALLING GENERATE()

member.name: M:AllcardEncryptDecrypt.EncryptDecrypt.RandomKeyGenerator.Generate
